website_summaries.verdict: This model offers a 2x zoom microphone along with the 1080p picture and 90x zoom, making this is a good option for users for whom clear audio is especially important in a camcorder.
pros: 1080p and 90x zoom compare favorably with other Panasonic models, but it is the 2x zoom microphone that makes this model stand out, offering a recording quality on par with higher end Panasonic models
Includes touch screen control during playback
Popular five-axis stabilization technology results in less motion blur during handheld recording
cons: With no built-in WiFi on this model, video sharing must be done through a memory card

customer_reviews.title: Junk! No warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Camera worked great excellent zoom and image stabilizers. I'd love it but less than 1 year unit will not hold a charge even when plugged in. 1 year warranty is false Panasonic will charge you for labor on broken parts after 90 days and also charge $75 for diagnosis. I've used the camcorder maybe 5 times never been neglecting. My question is how would you even get a 1 year warranty as they will charge you over the units cost for any work after 90 days. It false and misleading advertising. I will never buy another Panasonic product again! Just so you know if you buy this your rolling the dice. I would strongly recommend purchasing from another manufacturer. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camcorder!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this camera. The zoom is amazing. I read reviews and watched YouTube's of it and realized the clarity in the dark was poor. So i got a universal LED camcorder light to attatch to it. A small one. It works PERFECT. completely fixes that problem. It recently snowed at around 3am here in texas (rarely happens), i took the kids put with it and turned on the light, PERFECT shot and beautiful video to show the kids when they are older. I couldnt be happier! And the stability is incredible! It also allows you to take pics while recording! Too cool!
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Decent entry level camera.
customer_reviews.text: The video quality on this camcorder is decent, in low level light video gets a bit fuzzy. In daylight or well lit areas video is very good. The zoom is actually really good. Still photos are very good also. The size of the camera is small, does not take up much space. If you are looking for professional quality images, look elsewhere. If you are looking for decent quality for a great price, this camera fits that bill. I adjusted some camera setting to improve image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: An amazing little camera
customer_reviews.text: An amazing little camera. The video quality is amazing, and if I have any complaint, it would be the size of the screen. If you purchase this camera, I suggest you go online, and download the full user manual from Panasonic. You'll be amazed at what it can do. A great little camera, and well worth the money. A month later, and a few videos later---I LOVE this camera. I have a $1500 Canon camcorder that I love too, but, this one is so compact, the OIS system is great, the low light sensitivity is very good too. A terrific camera for twice the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Foley

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Using for high school sports, basketball/football ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Using for high school sports, basketball/football and is doing well after couple dozen games so far in last month.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Oppriecht

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, could show some improvement in sound
customer_reviews.text: This camera is super clear while recording and transfers to Pc without a glitch. Zoom is ridiculously good that I can see Alaska from my window Clearly now. As a musician the mic is ok if your recording yourself play, (doesn’t have depth like its closest competitor) but for talking and recording concerts if your not an audiophile should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jreviews

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item in May of 2018 and in February of 2019 it quit working. The image screen comes up with an error. It has a one year warranty for parts only not labor. You also have to send it end for repair at your cost. Panasonic informed us the average cost for repair is $181. Before this, we'd had a Sony camcorder for almost a decade. We'll go back to them after this disappointment. Otherwise, it was a decent camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NoahsMama

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about a year, then the battery was rejected by the camera
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviewer that stated theirs lasted only 1 year. The camera is listed here and now for $177.00, it would cost almost half that price to repair the error "This battery cannot be used". I cleaned the contacts on the battery and the camera with little improvement. The resolution for the video is very good, the zoom also, but the still camera is terrible, fuzzy and blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Thought
customer_reviews.text: I was led to believe that this camera had a time and date stamp that would play on my finished product when using the camera for work. I am a private investigator. The date and time stamp stays on the video when playing the video on the camera, but the date and time stamp is not visible after transferring the video to a computer. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Head

customer_reviews.title: Nice little had camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great HD(1080p/i) camera in a small package and price. The stabilization is good especially since this is so small it fit in you hand. I got this for a quick and easy three camera webcast system and it does the job. It does stay on 24/7 with power plug and doesn’t go to sleep or turn off, good for broadcast. You can get a clean HDMI out for projection or recording. It doesn’t do well in low light, the gain is very grainy. When you press record the hdmi signal cuts out. Other than that it’s a good camera for the price. Won’t make a movie but it will capture a family outing perfectly
customer_reviews.author: WhiteWongMedia

customer_reviews.title: I do like this. I bought it this model cause I ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like this. I bought it this model cause I had a HC-v250 Panasonic Wifi support. but I made a mistake, I leaveded connected, while was recording twice, and now my HC-v250 won't tape or take picture. Turns on but after you push the button to Rec/Picture get frozen. This model HC-v180k is beautiful. Full HD, best resolution on video is MP4 format (works better for me, according to my Video Editor), AVCHD still good quality but bigger file size. Love Panasonic Video Camera Recording.
customer_reviews.author: TheCowboy

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 15 months use.
customer_reviews.text: This camcorder was bought 15 months ago and used precisely once. Went to get it for this years vacation and it is broken already. It's very lightweight cheap plastic not like the older better versions Panasonic made. My older version last years. I am disappointed in this camcorder and would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Golf nut

customer_reviews.title: Dies after only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked fine until the 6 month mark when it started freezing while recording. Then after this, it wouldn't zoom. I restarted and usually that would fix it, but now, it's stuck on a specific zoom regardless of whether I restarted the camera or not (also pulled out battery, etc.). I expected it to last MUCH longer than just 6 months. The camera was very well taken care of, so I have no idea how it broke like this. I will now try to replace it with warranty. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good camcorder with breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, good reliability, can't go wrong here. Has 90x digital zoom at 10mp. Nice quality video. I wouldn't use for movie production but it's good for at home video, especially distance shots.
customer_reviews.author: Nate & Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Takes great HD movies. The zoom is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Kayak camera!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this camcorder instead of a GoPro on my kayak (front camera) and it has been superb so far! It's light weight enough to stay stable on my monopod 'boom stick' and the OIS works very well to alleviate water chop and trolling motor vibration. I normally have it plugged in to a power bank and it keeps going even in 100deg direct sunlight, the entire day, never overheated once so far. It's not waterproof obviously and I've worried once or twice about it getting splashed, but for the price it's a risk I'm willing to take for the superior image and sound quality vs an action camera.
customer_reviews.author: SeggX

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable Video Recording
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend this camera. Yes, the quality of video and zoom feature is stellar, however, I often have to press the record button two and sometimes three times to start recording. It is also rather slow on start up when the camera is turned on. I rely on the video camera for instant video recording and when it is slow to start up and the record button isn’t always working, it’s a good reason not to buy this camera. I wish I had returned it but I missed the return window. Expensive regret
customer_reviews.author: William Dewan

customer_reviews.title: They do NOT get much better!
customer_reviews.text: After owning dozens of camcorders in the past, I am highly selective on what I want & need in a camcorder. This unit blew me away! I could not believe all the selective features included. Most important to me, I could read a license plate clearly at over 750 feet away (mounted on a tripod). It is a SD card unit, and there are a couple features that I must adjust my thinking to, but are NOT disqualifiers. I had to re-read the furnished manual a couple times, and there is a more 'in depth' manual online. I was so impressed that I ordered 3 more units to replace aging camcorders in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Old Fl Dude

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Easy to use. Packed with features. Takes amazing video. Use it to record my daughter at her figure skating events. Works in low light well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: no cassette
customer_reviews.text: The door doesn't open to receive the cassette. What's the point?
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Appleton

customer_reviews.title: This video camera is so easy to operate and carry around
customer_reviews.text: This video camera is so easy to operate and carry around. I was surprised how small it was. My wife and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Edward K. Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Like the small
customer_reviews.text: Like the small, light weight. Easy to use. Takes really good videos and pictures. Would buy it again. Would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: Outdoors in bright light, fine. Indoor quality is not. I haven't tried it indoors with lights yet. But most digital cameras are OK for indoor use. Even at $200, this camera is not worth it. You get better quality from most cell phones. You have to move the camera very slowly when filming. Other vendors sell a bundled kit, for about the same price. I accidentally got it from a stand alone sale. My mistake. Should have not clicked the buy button so fast, or reviewed my order.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, nice still shots as well as video. Awesome zoom & very light
customer_reviews.author: DARREN MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Sad Christmas Morning.  Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen black, no picture. Touch screen buttons still visable and responsive. Bought it as a Christmas present, opened ot on Christmas morning and it doesnt work. Really upset that the window has closed for return or replacement. Sad Christmas Morning. Sad 11 year old boy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Priola

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas gift for family as we realized we had stopped taking videos once the old heavier camcorder went. Instead of pictures taken by cell phone or 5 second snippets, we realized after converting old VHS tapes to DVDs that we needed to start doing it again. Fits in the palm of your hand and so easy to use with great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Albert P. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: light weight and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: This is a light weight camera, and small enough to fit easily in anyone's hand. The on-screen menu takes a few minutes to get used to, but nothing too difficult. Love the fact that it doesn't have too many buttons to push, and it's basically point and shoot type of a camera. Using the SD card makes it very convenient to move your recording from the camcorder to a computer without use of wires. The zoom is incredible and makes far away shots look like you're right next to it. Satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Camera shuts off constantly.
customer_reviews.text: Valuable information was lost because this camera continually shut down. I would be better off figuring how to use my cell phone. Audio was terrible. It didn't pick up what I was saying during videoing. I am not wasting any more money on camcorders. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality video  - especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Panasonic has been a favorite of mine for video equipment for quite some time. This camcorder is easy to use, shoots good quality video, is lightweight, and is loaded with some very nice features - so regardless of the location or weather condition, you can get the needed shot. This little cam is one of my favorites - even over some of the Panasonic higher-end camcorders. It does a great job, rain or shine, and its light weight and quality video makes it a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality video
customer_reviews.text: Great quality video! I also love that this camera has a slideshow option with music to choose from. I feel like those old school parents busting out slides from their vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Romo

customer_reviews.title: Battery didn’t last no time!
customer_reviews.text: I fully charged it and I bought it to use Christmas morning to video my kids, and the battery don’t last a hr and was dead! I had thrown the box away so I can’t even return it. Waste of money & lost the time to video kids on Christmas morning. Highly up set!!’
customer_reviews.author: Charli mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Video Camera
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd Panasonic Video Camera since 2010. used for baseball practices and games. My first 2 cameras had built in memory and SD card capability. The Panasonic HC-V180 does not have internal memory. I have a good supply of SD cards that allows me to get many hours of video before I convert to DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Lou Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Very Concerned: Errors /Loss of Film
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the camera to film lacrosse games for my daughters HS team. All was well for the first month. During our league championship game the camera displayed a : ERROR OCCURRED. PLEASE TURN UNIT OFF, THEN TURN ON AGAIN. When I powered back on the unit the screen stated it was repairing data. Well I missed the last 22 minutes of the game that I had filmed. I can’t trust the unit anymore. The manual states to have the unit repaired if it continues? It’s 4 weeks old.
customer_reviews.author: Rog

customer_reviews.title: Good camcorder
customer_reviews.text: I am a little unhappy how long it takes from on to actually being able to record. But this is a problem with most camcorder. I like the "too fast" panning warning and the tilt indicator. Extra batteries are a tad pricier than other brands. Harder to find after market batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, well built, very affordable HDcamcorder
customer_reviews.text: Panasonic has done it again with this Ultra compact full HD camcorder that features a nice wide to closeup Zoom. The only drawback os that with no viewfinder the flip out lcd monitor is hard to see in brightsunlight but u can easily overlook that limitation to get a quality fullHD camcorder below $400. -John O.
customer_reviews.author: John Otth

customer_reviews.title: NO BATTERY CHARGER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!!!! No battery charger!!!!!! This is a great product and comes with a battery BUT NOT A BATTERY CHARGER. I put battery on the camcorder and turned it on and the battery has little charge. Now I will be purchasing a battery charger before being able to use the product. Good thing I purchased WAY ahead of the time I needed it or I would have been much more upset.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Confusing product information
customer_reviews.text: made me think I was getting the camcorder, tripod, and 64GB memory card for $197. But, Amazon customer service advised that $197 was only for the camcorder. I found that a bit confusing and somewhat misleading.
customer_reviews.author: kthompso

customer_reviews.title: Great little cam
customer_reviews.text: This little cam is excellent for the money and gets used often for family recordings . I have big hands so the touch screen is a bit cumbersome, but I wouldn't hesitate to purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: beattempo

customer_reviews.title: Zoom is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Its a lot of capability for the money. Things I love - the Zoom and works with Toshiba Flash Air. Things I don't love - you can not watch the output on external screen while recording and there is no external mic port so sound recording is always on.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera, insane zoom level that is crystal clear. I use it for videoing my daughters HS sports.
customer_reviews.author: Tom McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: Just got this camera, put an SD Card in it and now it is jammed, will not come out. Easily went in but won't come out. Please help. Any information would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and image quality!
customer_reviews.text: Zoom is difficult to get used to at long ranges, but that would be true for any similar camera.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Not good for MACRO zoom videos
customer_reviews.text: A nice little camcorder, but not able to focus on extremely small objects. I purchased the camera to record trout fly tying videos, and the camcorder was just not able to zoom/focus close enough for my purposes. I will be sending the camera back.
customer_reviews.author: OldSchool Executive

customer_reviews.title: I love the ZOOM!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera fills a far off zoom filming need I require. Panasonic is great when it comes to quality inexpensive camcorders. I highly recommend adding this zoom tool to your video kit.
customer_reviews.author: SoundSpongeTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, but too small for my large hands!
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera! Would have given 5 stars, except I had to return it because I have very large hands, and camera is very small which made it awkward to use! If you have a woman or have smaller hands you should have no problem!
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES V. RAINS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Great backup camera to my higher end Panasonic Hi Def cameras. Daytime footage i can tell no difference from my Panasonic 770 series cameras. Its ok for darker lit night footage but not as good as the 770's. Excellent choice though as a consumer camera used in better lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but trouble
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this purchase. We have yet to use the device. Had to send back because of overheating (though they said it is not) bought an extended warranty! Shipped for repair, packaged everything correctly (bubble wrapped, extra padding and items seperated and tagged-including the battery) and when they sent it back, NO BATTERY! I am so unhappy. This was a gift for our new Grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Jane P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: Great video camcorder. Really great video quality. Would recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Zoom is great!!! The picture quality sucks!!! You have to push pretty hard to get the touch screen to work.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: A Great Video Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little video camera with a host of 'extras' that make it a great choice. It is very small, light-weight, and easy to use. The only "negative" thus far is that it DOES NOT HAVE an audio-in port which was greatly desired for our use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Slow start up
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done but camera talked multiple second to turn in. As a private investigator, this has led me to miss great shots, so I wouldn't recommend for anyone who needs to capture an unexpected action video, but would be great for someone who needs a video cam just to record family moments, etc.
customer_reviews.author: k.Peters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great produced. I self recorded my first successful bow Mule deer hunt. Amazing video for a small camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery problems
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been nothing but problems. It will not accept any other battery but battery that came with camera. I ve done and tried everything. Disappointed fighting that since beginning
customer_reviews.author: monty walker

customer_reviews.title: Optical Zoom is the Ticket
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because of the optical zoom. Needed a long range camcorder to record baseball games from a center field angle. Placed 300+ feet from home plate, the video quality zoomed in to just the pitcher and batter is excellent. It's not grainy like you get with digital zooms even for night games. Very pleased with purchase. A sub $200 video camera with optical zoom that produces beautiful 1080P videos.
customer_reviews.author: BMK

customer_reviews.title: Good camcorder
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is decent, not great. Easy to use and the upload to storage over wireless function is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron I

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camcorder
customer_reviews.text: Even though camcorders are of the past, I am loving this one as it does the job for me on my Youtube Channel.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Hood

customer_reviews.title: great zoom.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, great zoom...needs to have a remote and slow motion for playback.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I never regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much. It feels more premium than the 380 version and has the HDR + Twin Camera. The camera without the OIS is really stable and with the OIS is super super stabilized. I recommend it for the ones who want more video quality and control + premium look.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Asiri

customer_reviews.title: Super zoom
customer_reviews.text: Nice basic vidcam with great zoom, very lightweight. Downsides are no viewfinder (only flip out screen) and menus are not easy to access. Will zoom up to 500x (combo optical and digital zoom).
customer_reviews.author: kcking

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Only wish the sub - camera worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only wish the sub - camera worked when the display is flipped and folded back into the camera side. (Sub - camera shuts off when the display is closed regardless if the screen is on the inside or outside.) Otherwise, great camcorder.
customer_reviews.author: Ron V.

customer_reviews.title: No Focus - No Good
customer_reviews.text: this camera would not focus while zoomed, even though my older Panasonic worked fine. I could not get this camera to do what I needed it to, it always produced white-washed pictures that were out of focus. No smart mode would work to take care of what most camcorders have - returned it and bought a Canon that works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: WiFi connection to iPhone fails consistently
customer_reviews.text: The WiFi connection between camera and iPhone disconnects temporarily ever time I try to use the remote control on the iPhone app
customer_reviews.author: Hadley E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great little video camera
customer_reviews.text: Its capabilities are far bigger than its size. High quality recordings. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: volkswalker

customer_reviews.title: Not good resolution in lower lighting situations
customer_reviews.text: I used it as a second camera at a conference and with the room lights up it did not do a good job.
customer_reviews.author: TNGEO

customer_reviews.title: Video flickers and the video quality was bad
customer_reviews.text: Video quality wasn't very good and the video had a slight little flicker so i set it to video at the maximum quality then flicker became way more obvious and it was no fun to watch the videos with that constant flickering I had to send it back plus even at maximum quality the flim seem to have a dark tint
customer_reviews.author: Kareen Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cam. Light, easy to use. Quality of video is great. Love the swivelling screen and the picture in picture feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sergei

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Initially, this recorder worked well. Performed all its functions as expected. Within a couple of months, recorder would no longer record. The LCD screen would not display what the lens was seeing and would tell you the image was too dark to record. Then nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Like it . Use it at least once a week. Zoom feature is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera
customer_reviews.text: I use it to video my grandson wrestling. Videos are great.
customer_reviews.author: NH Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest video quality but the zoom is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great camera/camcorder for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Have only taken a few photos and a couple videos. I like the fact you get good quality videos from a camcorder that is small and doesn't weigh a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I would like to have better hand press button
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is good and it is amazing how compact they make this to be. the only thing is the recording button is a little inconvenient to reach when holding it.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: Defective battery
customer_reviews.text: The camera won’t turn on . I got this for my dad for Christmas and he just tried to use it for the first time today after charging it . The battery won’t hold a charge !! And ofcourse now its too late to return or talk to an expert !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with great video making potential.
customer_reviews.text: This little camera has a number of features. It is simple enough to use out if the box, but as I work with the manual, I am impressed by its range of ability.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this camcorder
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this camcorder is awesome. I use it to record outdoor videos, and it has met all my expectations (as far as clear video and good audio). In addition to this, the light weight of the camera makes it very easy to carry in and out of the field. Considering the price, I certainly would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom, little else.
customer_reviews.text: Needs added convenience features for better experience. Poor low light quality, but great zoom in daylight. Needs remote control because touchscreen commands are cluttered and difficult to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Texican

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera For Action
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, easy to use and takes amazing videos. It's small so it's great for action and shooting on the fly.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: USED FOR VLOGING
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera to record several vlogs over the past month and it has held up really well. I love the zoom on it and I definitely recommend it for any new vlogers out there!
customer_reviews.author: Covid-19 home workout: WRECKED

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Very far zoom still clear. I use to record my hunts.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan winans

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very good for the money. Good optical zoom. Only takes 32 gb card. Haven't tried all the features yet but I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Good camara
customer_reviews.text: used it and can record far objects it is stable and good picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice to hold and use.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to hold. Used in Israel and even on a Camel did very well. Just looking for the cord to move the images from it to the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: ezonline

customer_reviews.title: Great video camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Using it to record performances of musicians and artists at Renaissance Festivals to help them promote themselves. Over 150 videos on my YouTube channel now.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kossor

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Havent had any issues yet. Picture is decent at full zoom. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

customer_reviews.title: Turn off every 15 to 20 mins
customer_reviews.text: It turns off every 15 to 20 mins. Then restart it again. I was try to use webcam. I want to too recording at lease 4 hours. It was worst than my old camcorder. But the webcam a video quality is good. Rich color. But not I expected it. Return it
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoyi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Optical Zoom Quality !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Optical Zoom Quality ! .... and unbelievably small & light !!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: and it's been perfect so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to use in acting class, and it's been perfect so far. It weighs next to nothing and suits my purposes beautifully. Easy to use and has a surprisingly decent picture for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Maseng

customer_reviews.title: The zoom is the best feature
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this camera to take on a moose hunting trip in Alaska. It was perfect. The zoom feature is absolutely amazing and the entire family has been able to enjoy the incredible sights from his trip. Best camcorder we have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Derric K.

customer_reviews.title: Small package great price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Lots of bells and whistles for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rod T.

customer_reviews.title: Just got it and learning the where's and How to's
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far haven't had a chance to use it yet but just from what I have seen while playing with it and learning the setting and where to go to change what setting is looks good and I am liking what I see.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Brackins

customer_reviews.title: Decent price for a decent camcorder
customer_reviews.text: When zooming it will not focus at a certain distance, good camera to play around with or travel with. Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: McLovin

customer_reviews.title: Fine product
customer_reviews.text: Use it for outdoor nature projects. Light weight, strap adjusts to fit hand. zoom and shutter button locations at finger tips. Does exactly what I need at the price I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: ed jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and sound. Ive went through a lot of trial and return cameras but this one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: BreAnne

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is similar to the one I had before but the previous one I had a touchscreen and manual controls. This one only has a touch screen. Also the audio recording can not be turned off. Overall this is a good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Green

customer_reviews.title: REALLY HAS NICE CLEAR PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great but I HATE THE SETUP IT COULD BE EASIER TO USE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Audio not synced
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to record YouTube videos but didn’t do as well as I thought it would. I constantly had problems with the audio not syncing correctly to the video.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Blocker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Poor battery life. My old Panasonic produces a better picture.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Panasonc HC-V180 Full HD Camcorder with 50x
customer_reviews.text: Camera phone are nice, but you do not have a zoom action like this camera. Now that s nice!
customer_reviews.author: Improving

customer_reviews.title: Only records 30 min segments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to record sermons. It only records 30 min segments. I tried various resolution settings but no change.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hooge

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, comfortable to hold, and the video quality is much ch better than I thought. The picture blurs when you zoom in to much, but things at a distance are still recognizable.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

product_meta.title: Panasonic Full HD Video Camera Camcorder HC-V180K, 50X Optical Zoom, 1/5.8-Inch BSI Sensor, Touch Enabled 2.7-Inch LCD Display (Black)
product_meta.description: Style:HC-V180KCompact, lightweight and easy to use, the Panasonic Full HD Camcorder HC-V180K brings a fun, worry-free experience to high-resolution video capture. Featuring a 5-axis image stabilizer for maximum handheld stability, this 1080p camera’s super-long 50X optical zoom and up to 90X intelligent zoom quickly bring distant objects in focus. A convenient 28mm wide-angle lens allows you to fit more people and scenery into settings like weddings, reunions and vacations. An advanced BSI sensor assures low-light video image quality while Panasonic’s Level Shot function automatically detects and compensates for distracting camera tilting. For added fun, the camera includes creative filter effects like 8mm Movie, Silent Movie, Miniature Effect and Time Lapse Recording, all easily accessible on the 2.7-inch LCD touch screen. A two-channel zoom microphone works in tandem with the zoom to ensure crisp, clear audio up close or at any distance.
feature_bullets: 50X and 90X Optical Zoom: Long 50X zoom and 90X intelligent zoom draws in the scene from far away. The focal length is 2.06 - 103 mm
Wide-angle Lens: A 28mm wide-angle lens is convenient for capturing group images in small spaces, such as weddings, reunions and vacations
1/5.8-Inch BSI Sensor: The Back Side Illumination Sensor has a large effective area with 2.20M effective pixels, suppressing noise even when shooting in dimly lit conditions
Creative Controls: Creative filter effects like 8mm Movie, Silent Movie, Miniature Effect and Time Lapse Recording add more personality to your high-definition recordings
Crisp, Clear Audio: A two-channel zoom microphone automatically adjusts recording volume higher or lower synced to the camcorder's active zooming capability for crisp, clear audio

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars455 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
